name: Charatan - Limited Edition Colina Robusto Grande
additionalNotes: Charatan is a cigar brand created especially for tobacco lovers in the UK, offering a unique blend of Nicaraguan and Indonesian tobacco. It stands out as a soft medium cigar with an exceptionally complex flavor, ideal to enjoy anytime and anywhere. The brand is distinguished by its commitment to quality, using select Cuban tobacco crops grown in Nicaragua for the filling, achieving a robust aromatic balance. With their large size and solid structure, Charatan cigars offer a Cuban-style wood flavor and delicate spices, making them an attractive choice for discerning connoisseurs in the UK.
